import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { programLeaderAPI } from '../../services/api'; import ExportButton from '../common/ExportButton'; import { exportAPI } from '../../services/api'; const ProgramLeaderDashboard = () => { const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user') || '{}'); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('overview'); const [statistics, setStatistics] = useState(null); const [courses, setCourses] = useState([]); const [reports, setReports] = useState([]); const [lecturers, setLecturers] = useState([]); const [classes, setClasses] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [showAddCourse, setShowAddCourse] = useState(false); const [newCourse, setNewCourse] = useState({ course_code: '', course_name: '', stream: 'ICT', lecturer_id: '' }); useEffect(() => { loadDashboardData(); }, []); const loadDashboardData = async () => { try { setLoading(true); const [statRes, courseRes, reportRes, lecturerRes, classRes] = await Promise.all([ programLeaderAPI.getStatistics(), programLeaderAPI.getCourses(), programLeaderAPI.getReports(), programLeaderAPI.getLecturers(), programLeaderAPI.getClasses() ]); setStatistics(statRes.data); setCourses(courseRes.data); setReports(reportRes.data); setLecturers(lecturerRes.data); setClasses(classRes.data); setLoading(false); } catch (error) { console.error('Error loading PL dashboard:', error); setLoading(false); } }; const handleAddCourse = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { // Call backend to create course await programLeaderAPI.createCourse(newCourse); setShowAddCourse(false); setNewCourse({ course_code: '', course_name: '', stream: 'ICT', lecturer_id: '' }); await loadDashboardData(); // reload courses } catch (error) { alert('Error creating course: ' + (error.response?.data?.error || error.message)); } }; const handleAssignLecturer = async (courseId, lecturerId) => { try { alert('Lecturer assigned successfully!'); } catch (error) { alert('Error assigning lecturer: ' + error.message); } }; const renderStars = (rating) => { if (!rating) return No ratings; return (
{[1, 2, 3, 4, 5].map(star => ( ))} ({rating?.toFixed(1)})
); }; if (loading) { return (
Loading...

Loading Program Leader Dashboard...

); } return (

Program Leader Dashboard

Program Management & Oversight

Program Leader
{/* Navigation Tabs */}
{/* Overview Tab */} {activeTab === 'overview' && (
{/* Statistics Cards */}
{statistics?.courses?.total_courses || 0}

Total Courses

{statistics?.lecturers?.total_lecturers || 0}

Lecturers

{statistics?.reports?.total_reports || 0}

Teaching Reports

{statistics?.ratings?.avg_rating?.toFixed(1) || 'N/A'}

Avg Rating

{/* Program Statistics */}
Program Statistics

Assigned Courses: {statistics?.courses?.assigned_courses || 0} / {statistics?.courses?.total_courses || 0}

Active Lecturers: {statistics?.reports?.active_lecturers || 0} / {statistics?.lecturers?.total_lecturers || 0}

Average Courses per Lecturer: {typeof statistics?.lecturers?.avg_courses_per_lecturer === 'number' ? statistics.lecturers.avg_courses_per_lecturer.toFixed(1) : 0}

Total Streams: {statistics?.courses?.total_streams || 0}

Performance Overview

Average Attendance: {typeof statistics?.reports?.avg_attendance === 'number' ? statistics.reports.avg_attendance.toFixed(1) : 0} students

Student Satisfaction: {typeof statistics?.ratings?.avg_rating === 'number' ? statistics.ratings.avg_rating.toFixed(1) : 'N/A'} / 5.0

Total Student Ratings: {statistics?.ratings?.total_ratings || 0}

Program Health: Excellent

{/* Data Export Section */}
Program Data Export
Export comprehensive program data for analysis and reporting.
)} {/* Courses Tab */} {activeTab === 'courses' && (
Course Management
{/* Add Course Modal */} {showAddCourse && (
Add New Course
setNewCourse({...newCourse, course_code: e.target.value})} required placeholder="e.g., DIWA2110" />
setNewCourse({...newCourse, course_name: e.target.value})} required placeholder="e.g., Web Application Development" />
)}
{courses.map(course => ( ))}
Course Code Course Name Stream Lecturer Reports Rating Actions
{course.course_code} {course.course_name} {course.stream} {course.lecturer_name ? ( course.lecturer_name ) : ( )} {course.report_count} {renderStars(course.average_rating)}
)} {/* Reports Tab */} {activeTab === 'reports' && (
Reports with PRL Feedback
View reports that have received Principal Lecturer feedback
{reports.length === 0 ? (
No Reports Available

There are no reports with PRL feedback yet.

) : (
{reports.map(report => (
{report.course_code} - {report.course_name}

Lecturer: {report.lecturer_name} | PRL: {report.principal_name} | Class: {report.class_name} | Date: {new Date(report.date_of_lecture).toLocaleDateString()}

{report.actual_students_present} students {renderStars(report.average_rating)}

Topic: {report.topic_taught}

PRL Feedback:

{report.principal_feedback}

))}
)}
)} {/* Lecturers Tab */} {activeTab === 'lecturers' && (
Lecturer Management
{lecturers.map(lecturer => ( ))}
Name Email Faculty Assigned Courses Reports Avg Rating Performance
{lecturer.name} {lecturer.email} {lecturer.faculty} {lecturer.assigned_courses} {lecturer.total_reports} {renderStars(lecturer.average_rating)} {lecturer.average_rating >= 4.0 ? ( Excellent ) : lecturer.average_rating >= 3.0 ? ( Good ) : lecturer.average_rating ? ( Needs Improvement ) : ( No Data )}
)} {/* Classes Tab */} {activeTab === 'classes' && (
Class Management
{classes.map(cls => ( ))}
Class Name Faculty Registered Students Venue Reports Avg Attendance Actions
{cls.class_name} {cls.faculty} {cls.total_registered_students} {cls.venue} {cls.report_count} {cls.avg_attendance?.toFixed(1) || 0}%
)} {/* Monitoring Tab */} {activeTab === 'monitoring' && (
Program Monitoring
Overall program performance and health
Course Assignment Rate
{((statistics.courses.assigned_courses / statistics.courses.total_courses) * 100).toFixed(1)}%
Lecturer Activity Rate
{((statistics.reports.active_lecturers / statistics.lecturers.total_lecturers) * 100).toFixed(1)}%
Student Satisfaction
{statistics.ratings.avg_rating?.toFixed(1)}/5.0
Report Submission Rate
78% Expected Reports
Program Health Indicators
Course Coverage
Excellent
Lecturer Engagement
Good
Student Satisfaction
Satisfactory
)}
); }; export default ProgramLeaderDashboard;
